std.value: It was summer holiday and Xiao Ming was alone at home. He did not do his homework but played computer games to kill time. He seemed to be enjoying every minute of the games and forgot his lunch. When he felt hungry, he got instant noodles, without stopping his games. Xiao Ming did not rest at all but continued with his games after eating. Suddenly, he felt pain in the stomach. And then he was sent to the hospital. In the hospital his mother told him not to have junk food anymore. Xiao Ming felt guilty about that.
